Articles.Content:
i absolutely love this game althouugh its the xbox version as i dont have a pc to run it, bt was very happy to see it coming out on the xbox. The controls are confusing some til you get used to it. 

Im wondering if there will be any more updates for the console and will mods come t the console?

Welcome aboard!

There is a patch in development/testing at the moment, though we don't know when it will be released.

There's no official word on mods on the console other than they're currently not supported, personally I suspect it will stay that way.
